title: AdAway v3.0 (Android 4.1+) Installer
description:
ADAWAY v3.0 (Android 4.1+)



AdAway blocks those annoying ads from Android third-party free or paid apps.

The original AdAway app was developed by Dominik SchÃƒÂ¼rmann and was removed by Google due to Violation of section 4.4 of the Developer Distribution Agreement (sic!). The real reason it was removed was because the app interfered with Google's ads business - Google weren't making much money because the app blocks all ads not only from Google, but also their affiliates and other ads networks.

SchÃƒÂ¼rmann no longer release an Android package (APK) for AdAway, but he still participate in its development. You can find AdAway source codes at https://github.com/dschuermann/ad-away. You can download the source codes in your IDE and build your own AdAway app if you wish.

The AdAway Android package included in this torrent was built by F-Droid. You can find them at https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdid=org.adaway.


--------------------------
Prerequisite requirement:
--------------------------
1. A rooted Android device.
2. Android 4.1 (Jellybean) and up.


--------------------------
Steps to install the APK:
--------------------------

1. On Android 4 and 5, go to "Settings | Security" and tick "Unknown Sources".


2. Copy the APK onto phone's internal SD card using a Wifi program or directly via the phone's USB connection.


3. Use a file manager like Root Explorer, etc to browse to location of saved APK.


4. Tap on APK to install.


Enjoy
